vistra.framework.util

Class ImmutableBidirectIterator<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • vistra.framework.util.ImmutableBidirectIterator<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Iterator<E>, IBidirectIterator<E>

    public class ImmutableBidirectIterator<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBidirectIterator<E>
    A bidirectional iterator over a list, immutable.
    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
    See Also:
    ListIterator
